result.execSummary:
The defendant James R Helm Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations.   Not to possess or consume alcoholic beverages.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James R Helm Jr

records.addlTxt: Defendant discharged from probation on 12-11-20; unpaid supervision fees of $20
Probation is extended for 1 year or until AODA counseling is completed.
Waiver of Appearance filed by Agent Kaitlyn Bauer
Filed by Probation Agent Kaitlyn Bauer requesting probation be extended for 1 year or until AODA counseling is completed.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Cases called: 15CF243, 16CM134, 15CM166 & 15CF255, Defendant James R Helm in court with attorney Brent W. Varner.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Victims were notified of today's hearing. Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to counts 1,2,5 in 15CF243, cts. 3&4 in 15CM166, ct. 3 in 15CF255. Factual bases established. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgments. Sentencing statements by Attys. Varner & Cross. Defendant made a statement. In 15CF243 on ct. 1, Court imposed 6 months jail, start 6/17/16 at 7 p.m. Huber granted. $343 costs, on ct. 2, $243 costs imposed, on ct. 5, sentence withheld, 4 yr. probation, conds: Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations. Complete anger management and domestic abuse counseling. Submit DNA sample. $518 costs. Not to possess or consume alcoholic beverages. (6 days jail credit on ct. 1).  In 15CF255, 4 yr. probation, conds: $518 costs. Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations. Not to possess or consume alcoholic beverages. (4 days jail credit)  In 15CM166 on cts. 3&4, Court withheld sentence, 2 yr. probation, conds: $443 & $243 costs. Complete anger management counseling. No contact with D.H. $130.40 restitution on ct. 4. (3 days jail credit) Posted bonds applied to costs. Court dismissed all other counts not pled to. 16CM134 dismissed. Called 1:10 p.m. Adjourned 1:46 p.m.

Defendant James R Helm in court with attorney Brent W. Varner.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Cases called: 15CF255, 15CF243 and 15CM166.  In both felony cases, Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over.   Information filed, reading waived.  In all cases defendant stood mute.  Court entered not guilty plea, jury trial to be set. Bond continued.
No contact with R.G.  Standard felony conditions.

Defendant James R Helm by video in custody with attorney Ryan T. Frank.  Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  $250.00 cash bond.  No contact with R.G.  Standard felony conditions.  Defendant did not waive time limits for preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 30, 2015 at 09:00 am.
